YVTdCQ.en:
[Falcon Pipe Merchant]
You don't need a Falcon Pipe, now do you?

YlTdCQ.en:
[Falcon Pipe Merchant]
You don't need a Falcon, now do you?

Y1TdCQ.en:
[Falcon Pipe Merchant]
Do you need a Falcon?
With this magic pipe, you can summon it anytime, from anywhere!

ZFTdCQ.en:
[Falcon Pipe Merchant]
Amazing, isn't it? Hah hah hah!

ZVTdCQ.en:
[Falcon Pipe Merchant]
Why is a Bard selling Falcon Pipes, you ask?
Because I don't know how to play them. Hah hah hah!

ZlTdCQ.en:
[Falcon Pipe Merchant]
I don't even know how to use the <^FF0000Falconry Mastery^000000> skill or command a Falcon. It'd probably peck my hat to rags if I summoned it.

Z1TdCQ.en:
[Falcon Pipe Merchant]
Still, my pipes aren't for free.
I have to making a living just like everyone else, you know.

aFTdCQ.en:
[Falcon Pipe Merchant]
If you want a Falcon Pipe, I'll give it to you for 12,500 Zeny. Too expensive?

aVTdCQ.en:
[Falcon Pipe Merchant]
Alright, I feel generous today. How about 10,000 Zeny?
Don't ask for anything below!

bFTdCQ.en:
[Falcon Pipe Merchant]
How disappointing! Come back if you change your mind.

bVTdCQ.en:
- Wait a moment!! -
- You're carrying too many items -
- to get more. -
- Please lighten your load, -
- and then try again. -

blTdCQ.en:
[Falcon Pipe Merchant]
Do you have enough Zeny?
Reality can be harsh.
No Zeny, no honey!

b1TdCQ.en:
[Falcon Pipe Merchant]
Here, take your pipe.
Play it to summon a Falcon whenever.

cFTdCQ.en:
[Falcon Pipe Merchant]
Just a reminder,
you must learn the <^FF0000Falconry Mastery^000000> skill to summon a Falcon.
